Name: Ancient Archives 1
Description: Gain 1 Tome of Traits.

Name: Ascension
Description: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 75% more damage.

Name: Axiom Arc 2
Description: When your units kill an enemy they gain 30 Mana.

Name: Battlemage 2
Description: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 25 Armor and 25 Ability Power.

Name: Better Together
Description: Aura items that buff your team have their effects increased by 33%. Gain a Locket of the Iron Solari.

Name: Big Friend 2
Description: Your units that start combat next to a unit with over 1650 Health take 18% less damage for the rest of combat.

Name: Built Different 2
Description: Your units with no Traits active gain 400 Health and 65% Attack Speed.

Name: Calculated Loss
Description: After losing your combat, gain 2 gold and a free Shop refresh.

Name: Celestial Blessing 2
Description: Your units heal for 15% of the damage dealt by attacks and abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 450 Health.

Name: Clear Mind
Description: If you have no units on your bench at the end of a round, gain 3 experience points.

Name: Cluttered Mind
Description: If your bench is full at the end of a round, gain 4 experience points.

Name: Component Grab Bag
Description: Gain 3 random item components.

Name: Cybernetic Implants 2
Description: Your units equipped with an item gain 300 Health and 15 Attack Damage.

Name: Cybernetic Shell 2
Description: Your champions holding an item gain 250 Health and 45 Armor.

Name: Cybernetic Uplink 2
Description: Your champions holding an item gain 250 Health and restore 3 Mana per second.

Name: Disintegrator 2
Description: Your unit's attacks deal bonus magic damage equal to 2.5% of the target's maximum Health.

Name: Double Trouble 2
Description: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 33 Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

Name: Electrocharge 2
Description: When your units receive a critical strike, they deal 150 magic damage to nearby enemies.

Name: Exiles 2
Description: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 35% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

Name: Featherweights 2
Description: Your 1 and 2 cost units gain 65% movement and Attack Speed.

Name: First Aid Kit 2
Description: All healing and shielding received by your units is increased by 35%.

Name: Gadget Expert
Description: Direct Damage items deal 40% more damage as true damage. Gain a Statikk Shiv.

Name: Hustler
Description: If you have less than 20 gold at the end of a round, gain 3 gold.

Name: Jeweled Lotus
Description: Magic and true damage from your units' Abilities can critically strike.

Name: Knife's Edge 2
Description: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 25 Attack Damage.

Name: Last Stand
Description: The first time you would die, instead drop to 1 Health. After this effect triggers, your units gain 200 Health, 20 Armor and Magic Resist, and 20% Omnivamp.

Name: Luden's Echo 2
Description: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 225 bonus magic damage.

Name: Makeshift Armor 2
Description: Your units with no items gain 45 Armor and Magic Resist.

Name: Metabolic Accelerator
Description: Your Tactician moves faster and heals 2 Health at the start of each round.

Name: Phony Frontline
Description: Gain 2 Target Dummies.

Name: Portable Forge
Description: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 3 unique Artifacts crafted by Ornn.

Name: Preparation 2
Description: Champions on your bench permanently gain 8 Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 32.

Name: Rich Get Richer
Description: Gain 10 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

Name: Rich Get Richer Plus
Description: Gain 15 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

Name: Salvage Bin
Description: Gain a random completed item. Selling champions breaks apart their full items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

Name: Scoped Weapons 1
Description: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain +2 Attack Range and 15% Attack Speed.

Name: Second Wind 2
Description: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 75% of their missing Health.

Name: Stand United 2
Description: Your units gain 3 Attack Damage and Ability Power per Trait active across your team.

Name: Sunfire Board
Description: At the start of combat, burn all enemies for 15% of their maximum HP over 15 seconds and reduce healing received by 50%.

Name: Three's Company
Description: Gain 3 random 3-cost champions.

Name: Thrill Of The Hunt 2
Description: Your units heal 500 Health on kill.

Name: Trade Sector
Description: Gain a free Shop refresh each round.

Name: Trade Sector Plus
Description: Gain a free Shop refresh each round. Gain 8 golds.

Name: Tri Force 2
Description: Your 3-cost champions gain 333 Health, 23 Mana, and 33% Attack Speed.

Name: True Twos
Description: Gain 2 random 2-star Tier 1 champions and 2 gold.

Name: Ace Crest
Description: Gain an Ace Emblem and a 2 gold.

Name: A.D.M.I.N Crest
Description: Gain an A.D.M.I.N. Emblem and a Blitzcrank.

Name: Aegis Crest
Description: Gain an Aegis Emblem and a Vi.

Name: Anima Squad Crest
Description: Gain an Anima Squad Emblem and a Sylas.

Name: Brawler Crest
Description: Gain a Brawler Emblem and a Lee Sin.

Name: Spellslinger Crest
Description: Gain a Spellslinger Emblem and an Annie.

Name: Civilian Crest
Description: Gain a Civilian Emblem and a Galio.

Name: Sureshot Crest
Description: Gain a Sureshot Emblem and a Sivir.

Name: Defender Crest
Description: Gain a Defender Emblem and a Poppy.

Name: Duelist Crest
Description: Gain a Duelist Emblem and a Yasuo.

Name: Mecha: PRIME Crest
Description: Gain a Mecha: PRIME Emblem and a Draven.

Name: Hacker Crest
Description: Gain a Hacker Emblem and 2 gold.

Name: Heart Crest
Description: Gain a Heart Emblem and a Yuumi.

Name: LaserCorps Crest
Description: Gain an LaserCorps Emblem and a Yasuo.

Name: Mascot Crest
Description: Gain a Mascot Emblem and a Yuumi.

Name: Ox Force Crest
Description: Gain an Ox Force Emblem and an Annie.

Name: Prankster Crest
Description: Gain a Prankster Emblem and a Jinx.

Name: Recon Crest
Description: Gain a Recon Emblem.

Name: Renegade Crest
Description: Gain a Renegade Emblem and a Talon.

Name: Star Guardian Crest
Description: Gain a Star Guardian Emblem and a Rell.

Name: Underground Crest
Description: Gain an Underground Emblem and a Vi.
